config.name: 骷髅不使用尸体爆炸动画
config.description: 移除召唤骷髅时的尸体爆炸动画。现在你可以召唤而不需要让所有东西都充满鲜血。

config.name: Skeleton with kyte shield. With enought mastery they spawn with bad shield, but they can spawn with a kyte shield.
config.description: Every skeleton summoned have kyte shield. En D2R each skeleton have 5% chance of have a shield that give 3% chance of block.

config.name: Elementalgolem
config.description: Choose what elementalgolem want summon with firegolem skill. Every golem have extra resis and damage to the choosen element, absorbelement damage and have that element aura.

options.label: Icegolem with custom textures. Has cold element.
Stormgolem with custom textures. Has lightning element.
Arcanegolem with custom textures. Has magic element.

config.name: Fanatic skeleton
config.description: Dont want use axes for that beast runeword? Bored of useless skeletons? This modification do that skeleton has fanaticism aura. Dont waste the atk speed and hit rating in yourself if your skeletons will do all the work.

options.label: Fanatic skeleton. Has fanaticism aura that level up every 3 levels.

config.name: Priest skeleton
config.description: Skeleton mages are useless. They dont survive much, have low damage and their missiles have little precision... At least they dominate the elements. Why don't they defend us from them? Priestskeleton has salvation for rise resistences.

options.label: Priest skeleton. Has salvation aura that level up every 3 levels starting at level 10.

config.name: Sandgolem
config.description: Replace claygolem for sandgolem. Everyone knows that if the sand covers you, it will not only slow you down, you won't be able to defend yourself either. This modification replace claygolem for him upgraded version: the sandgolem. Sandgolem has conviction aura that reduce def and elemental resists.

options.label: Sandgolem. Has conviction aura that level up every 2 levels.

config.name: Bloodygolem
config.description: Replace bloodgolem for bloodygolem. Bloodgolem is so useless. He only heal the summoner. This modification add bloodygolem that has prayer aura that heal your team.

options.label: Bloodygolem. Has prayer aura that level up every 2 levels.

config.name: Steelgolem
config.description: Replace irongolem for steelgolem. Create a steelgolem golem that will protect your team. Steelgolem has Defiance aura that rise defense. This golem can be summoned with a aura item. The resultant golem will have thorn + defiance + item aura.

options.label: Steelgolem. Has concentration aura that level up every 3 levels.

config.name: Legion
config.description: We are legion. Your legion of revives will protect you. Revive has defiance aura that rise defense.

options.label: Legion. Has defiance aura that level up every 3 levels.

config.name: No collisions
config.description: Remove collosion with summons. This help for no get struck in corridors, or let your meele minions move through a wall of mages. Recomended for earlygame wout enigma.

config.name: Custom names. Warning may be no compatible with new versions. If game crash, test disabling this option
config.description: Install custom names for party sprites.
